dt-button.name: searchBuilder
dt-button.summary: A single button that displays the SearchBuilder container in a popover.
dt-button.description: This button type creates a popover that contains the SearchBuilder container. This allows SearchBuilder to be used without it taking up extra space in the dom.
dt-button.option: This option allows for SearchBuilder to be configured as it would in a normal initialisation. All of the `-feature searchBuilder` options can be configured within this object.
This options allows the text within the button to be configured. This can also be configured with the `-init language.searchBuilder.button` option.
For the SearchBuilder button the init function sets up SearchBuilder so that it is ready to be used immediately when the user presses the button.
The action function for the SearchBuilder button displays the SearchBuilder container to the user in a popover.
